name: Texas Smith Adventures - Volume I
description:
Gameplay

Explore a perilous temple and uncover an ancient mystery in this cute pixel art platformer with a dark side.

Search for keys and the victory portal in 15 levels, spread across 3 unique episodes with their own theme.

Fight terrifying bosses and make daring jumps as you try to reach the end of your ordeal.

Achieve multiple different awards for completing challenges in each level (see if you can get an award for an entire episode).

Solve a great and terrible mystery with roots both ancient and new.

Episodes

Episode 1 - The Temple

Episode 2 - The Mountain

Episode 3 - The Otherworld

Soundtrack

Game Jolt
